author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...IMELDA FORECAST TO BRING HURRICANE-FORCE WINDS, DAMAGING WAVES AND FLASH FLOODING TO BERMUDA LATE TODAY...
summary: ...IMELDA FORECAST TO BRING HURRICANE-FORCE WINDS, DAMAGING WAVES AND FLASH FLOODING TO BERMUDA LATE TODAY... As of 5:00 AM EDT Wed Oct 01 the center of Imelda was located near 30.2, -72.1 with movement ENE at 20 mph. The minimum central pressure was 974 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 90 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Imelda (AT4/AL092025)
